channel.title: !Look please!
channel.description:
Ok,
My friend trying to use my client but it comes up with this error saying:
(Connection Error - Retrying in (seconds))
And i dunno why its doing that.. My bro has the client and it works 100% with him so what with this?
This is happening to my friend.

item.title: !Look please!
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

You don’t have the cache/it cannot locate it.

Read full topic
